name: Duality: Rotating Maze
description:
This game is made for the #Duality game jam. The Theme is Rotation.
Controls:
Left and Right Arrows rotate the maze.

This starts out as a ball maze you must navigate to the checkpoint. When you reach the checkpoint you become a balloon and must navigate to the final exit. Stars give you points, but spike balls kill you.

It's twin game  is here:
https://logicandchaos.itch.io/duality-gravity-inversion

They share the same game world.
